mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post(id, post_title, post_content, post_summary, post_type, member_id, created_date, updated_date) values (#{id}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postSummary}, #{postType}, #{memberId}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)
mapper.select:
select p.id, p.post_title, p.post_type, p.created_date, p.updated_date, p.post_view_count, m.member_nickname, (select count(*) from tbl_reply r where r.post_id = p.id) as reply_count from tbl_post p join tbl_member m on p.member_id = m.id
where p.post_status = 'VISIBLE' and p.post_type in ('VOLUNTEER', 'DONATION', 'SUPPORT', 'REVIEW') order by
p.created_date p.post_view_count reply_count p.created_date
desc limit #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount};

select p.id, p.post_title, p.post_type, p.created_date, p.updated_date, p.post_view_count, m.member_nickname, p.post_type, (select count(id) from tbl_reply r where r.post_id = p.id) as reply_count from tbl_post p join tbl_member m on p.member_id = m.id
where p.post_type = #{filterType} and p.post_status = 'VISIBLE' and p.post_type in ('VOLUNTEER', 'DONATION', 'SUPPORT', 'REVIEW') order by p.created_date desc limit #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount};
select count(*) from tbl_post where post_status = 'VISIBLE' and post_type in ('VOLUNTEER', 'DONATION', 'SUPPORT', 'REVIEW')

select count(*) from tbl_post p

select * from tbl_post where id = #{id} and post_status = 'VISIBLE' and post_type in ('VOLUNTEER', 'DONATION', 'SUPPORT', 'REVIEW')
